title: Drawing, "Official for Winter Double Shell Lubricating Oil, Shell-Mex"
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Running dot and dash figure in yellow is superimposed on a red oak leaf, shaded to black. Text in black, white and red: OFFICIAL FOR WINTER / DOUBLE / SHELL / LUBRICATING / OIL.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Official for Winter Double Shell Lubricating Oil, Shell-Mex".
Brush and gouache, graphite on paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-544.
